description: Complete "Fantastic Voyage" and unlock all endings.

description: Witness the awesome meteorological power of Bennett's phenomenally bad luck.
requirements: Complete Ad Astra...

description: Activate the mechanisms and obtain the treasure without making any mistakes.
requirements: Successfully complete the mechanism puzzle in Expansive Eya.
steps:
Enter the ruins
Enter Temple of the Wolf's Quest Domain: Deserted Ruins of Eya
Enter Temple of the Wolf's Quest Domain: Deserted Ruins of Eya

Investigate the room with Bennett
There are three investigation spots
Wait for Bennett to unlock the gate mechanism

Solve the puzzle of the mechanism
Solution: First activate the mechanism surrounded by three torches, then the one with one torch, then the one with two torches.
Solution: First activate the mechanism surrounded by three torches, then the one with one torch, then the one with two torches.
Help Bennett open the treasure chest

description: Complete "Signs of Evil" and unlock all endings.

requirements: Complete Home-Made Chilibrew.

description: Complete "Chivalric Training" and unlock all endings.

requirements: Complete Live Practice.
steps: Look for slimes in Mondstadt's outskirts

Defeat the Geo Slimes
Complete the challenge in 1 minute and 15 seconds.
Failing this challenge has no consequence.
Complete the challenge in 1 minute and 15 seconds.
Failing this challenge has no consequence.
Look for the next training target

Defeat the Dendro Slimes
Complete the challenge in 10 seconds.
Failing this challenge has no consequence. The Dendro slimes will not despawn after the 10 seconds are up, but defeating them is not required for the next step.
Failing this challenge has no consequence. The Dendro slimes will not despawn after the 10 seconds are up, but defeating them is not required for the next step.
Look for the next training target

Complete the challenge in 25 seconds.

Failing this challenge has no consequence.
